desc-with-translation.zh: Dialog 组件可以向用户提供信息，或要求他们作出决定。
desc-with-translation.en-ai: The Dialog component can provide information to the user or ask them to make a decision.

desc-with-translation.zh: 绑定的值，用于控制是否显示对话框
desc-with-translation.en-ai: The bound value that controls whether the dialog box is displayed

desc-with-translation.zh: 开启持久化后，点击遮罩层不会关闭对话框。
desc-with-translation.en-ai: After persistence is enabled, clicking the mask layer does not close the dialog box.

desc-with-translation.zh: 可以非常容易地将对话框改为抽屉
desc-with-translation.en-ai: You can easily change the dialog box to a drawer
